conclusion: Analyze the flow of liquid through the system of baffles and containers.
Determine which container (D or E) the liquid will flow into after passing through the baffles.
Arrows labeled A, B, and C indicate the direction of flow from left to right.
Liquid will flow through the baffles in the direction indicated by the arrows.
Liquid will flow from container A through the baffles to container D.
Since the liquid flows from A through the baffles to D, it will flow into D.
